data.current_summary: Verify the checksum of an EAN code
data.description_suggestion: Validates the checksum digit of an EAN (European Article Number) barcode code to verify its integrity and correctness. Accepts an EAN code as input and returns a verification result indicating whether the checksum is valid. This operation is useful for confirming that a barcode has been correctly entered or scanned before performing product lookups or database operations.

data.current_summary: Search for a issuing country of a barcode
data.current_description: Search for a issuing country of a barcode. In contrast to barcode-lookup, this will always give a result, even if we don't know the product name.
data.description_suggestion: Identifies the issuing country of a barcode based on its prefix. Accepts an EAN barcode code as input. Always returns an IssuingCountry result with country information, even when product details are unavailable. Unlike barcode-lookup, this operation guarantees a result for valid barcode prefixes. Returns country code and name information.
data.reasoning: Summary has grammatical issue ('a issuing' should be 'an issuing'). Description provides good context about the difference from barcode-lookup but lacks clarity on input parameters and output structure. Improved summary grammatically and made it more concise. Enhanced description to specify input format, output schema (IssuingCountry), and guarantee of results.
